duties_responsibilities.duty: Sourcing Leads: Great at meeting new prospective founders, actively build lasting relationships, engage and attract the right set of founders who meet Airdrop's team expectations
Analyst: Constantly on top of market trends, ability to focus and help foresee future market trends
Deal Evaluation: Work with Airdrop's investing partner to evaluate the business idea/leads/teams

Portfolio Support: Ask founders how you can help them get traction, retain users, lend operational support, or even find great talent. Step up and be actively engaged with the companies and markets you follow

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, or a related field (Master's preferred)
